Posts.Content: i am a 51 yr old female who had a lumpoctomy and radiation in 2005.just had another mamo and ultrasound and had to go for a biopsy. heard from my dr today that thank god it was benign but still should be removed. im opting for a mastectomy but would like to hear from other women with simmilar situations or anyone that could help.
Posts.Title: mastectomy
